Author: ethanmahintorabi
Content: Also just fyi Yosys has a clockgate command https://yosyshq.readthedocs.io/projects/yosys/en/0.46/cmd/clockgate.html

Author: ethanmahintorabi
Content: You need to run opt_dff before it to make sure all the flops are turned into enables and then you can use that command to convert some portion of them to clock gates
